description: Returns the name of the specified keyspace, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN), the replication strategy, the Amazon Web Services Regions of a multi-Region keyspace, and the status of newly added Regions after an UpdateKeyspace operation.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: Returns the ARN of the keyspace.

nested_items.name: replicationStrategy
nested_items.description: Returns the replication strategy of the keyspace. The options are SINGLE_REGION or MULTI_REGION.

nested_items.name: replicationRegions
nested_items.description: If the replicationStrategy of the keyspace is MULTI_REGION, a list of replication Regions is returned.

nested_items.name: replicationGroupStatuses
nested_items.description: A list of all Regions the keyspace is replicated in after the update keyspace operation and their status.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The name of the Region that was added to the keyspace.

nested_items.name: tablesReplicationProgress
nested_items.description: This shows the replication progress of tables in the keyspace. The value is expressed as a percentage of the newly replicated tables with status Active compared to the total number of tables in the keyspace.
